summary: The shocking story of Rev. Fred Phelps, the Westboro Baptist Church, those who oppose it, and those who chose to leave it all behind.
cast: Bill Bunten|Warren Carter|Kelly Franz|Jeff Gannon|Pedro L. Irigonegaray|George E. King Jr.|Ed Klump|Mike 'Gunner' Minor|Fred Phelps|Jonathan Phelps|Sara Phelps|Timothy Phelps|Rebekah Phelps-Roper|Shirley Phelps-Roper
title: Fall from Grace
